coat-of-colors.context: Jacob's gift to his favorite son

god-meant-for-good.hebrew: אַתֶּם חֲשַׁבְתֶּם עָלַי רָעָה אֱלֹהִים חֲשָׁבָהּ לְטֹבָה
god-meant-for-good.english: You meant evil against me, but God meant it for good

resist-temptation.english: How can I do this great wickedness and sin against God?

interpreting-dreams.hebrew: בִּלְעָדָי אֱלֹהִים יַעֲנֶה אֶת שְׁלוֹם פַּרְעֹה
interpreting-dreams.english: It is not in me; God will give Pharaoh a favorable answer
interpreting-dreams.mood: humble credit to God, gifted interpreter

reveal-to-brothers.english: I am Joseph! Is my father still alive?

second-in-egypt.english: He had him ride in his second chariot
